articles.author: Quentyn Kennemer
articles.title: Dyson's AR app shows you where you've vacuumed - The Verge
articles.description: Dyson’s AR-powered CleanTrace feature uses your smartphone to show precisely where you’ve vacuumed. For now, it only works with its Gen5detect vacuum.
articles.content:

articles.description: The particle bearing his name lives on
